task: Коротко опиши, как устроены агенты в KB Labs и почему это полезно

phases.name: Understand context
phases.description: Gather existing documentation or notes about KB Labs agents to ensure accuracy.

steps.action: Search repository for agent documentation or KB Labs references.
steps.expectedOutcome: List of files containing relevant information.

phases.name: Draft summary
phases.description: Write a concise description of how agents work in KB Labs and their usefulness.

steps.action: Read identified documentation files for key points.
steps.expectedOutcome: Key details about agent architecture and benefits.

steps.action: Draft short explanation in target language (Russian).
steps.expectedOutcome: Draft summary file describing agents and value.

phases.name: Review and finalize
phases.description: Verify accuracy and clarity of summary.

steps.action: Edit draft for brevity and clarity if needed.
steps.expectedOutcome: Polished final summary ready for use.
